title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, March 17, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Penelope Lively (1933), the only writer to win both the Carnegie Medal and the Booker Prize. Her memoir, “Life in the Garden,” was published in 2018.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
